title: Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms - $100 value add-on
description: Grab your $100 value add-on pack for Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realm! You just need to Install and log in to Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms until 6/20/2024 to unlock the "Duke Ravengard's Champions of Renown" pack!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the giveaway page.
2.  Install and log in to Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms via Epic Games Store until 6/20/2024.

title: Redout 2 (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Enter the fastest racing game in the universe at no cost! Grab Redout 2 for free on the Epic Games Store! Redout 2 is a tribute to classic arcade racing games, where anti-gravity racing is one of the galaxy’s most popular sports. Don’t miss your chance to grab this high-speed futuristic game!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library

title: Fortnite: Overclocked Combo Pack Giveaway
description: Unlock peak performance in Fortnite with the free Overclocked Combo Pack via Epic Games Store! This pack unlocks exclusive in-game items, including a Back Bling and a Wrap!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Claim directly via Epic Games Store before the offer expires.
3. Have fun!

title: Pinball FX - Super League Football (DLC) Giveaway
description: Download Pinball FX - Super League Football (DLC) for free via Steam (or Epic Games Store) and keep it forever. Please note this DLC requires the base game Pinball FX (free-to-play) to enjoy this content.
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Download this DLC directly via Steam (or Epic Games Store) before the offer expires.
3. Don´t forget to install the base game.

title: Divine Knockout Serious Business Hercules Skin Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Divine Knockout Skin Key and unlock the Serious Business Skin for Hercules! Please note the base game Divine Knockout (free-to-play) is required to enjoy this add-on content.
instructions:
1. Log in or register to your free Alienware Arena account.
2. Click the button to unlock your key and follow the giveaway instructions.

title: Fangs Heroic Founder's Pack Key Giveaway
description: Score Fangs Heroic Founder's Pack Key and unlock lots of in-game items for Fangs including 14 Heroes, 1,000 Realm Gold, Season Zero Battle Pass and much more!
instructions:
1. Login into your free Alienware Arena account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key (Please note the key must be redeemed in-game).
